highlights.description: MCP plugin enabling AI coding assistants (Claude Code, AWS Kiro, Gemini CLI) to make phone calls to users for task completion, clarification, or complex discussions
Premium voice quality using ElevenLabs streaming TTS and Deepgram streaming STT
Single 53 MB Go binary with no runtime dependencies

added.description: MCP voice call plugin with omnivoice stack integration
`initiate_call` tool - start a new call to the user with initial message
`continue_call` tool - continue conversation on active call
`speak_to_user` tool - speak without waiting for response
`end_call` tool - end call with optional goodbye message
Call manager orchestrating TTS, STT, and phone providers
Multi-assistant plugin generator for Claude Code, AWS Kiro CLI, and Gemini CLI
MCP plugin configuration and build artifacts

fixed.description: Downgrade ngrok to v1.12.0 and pin log15/v3 to v3.0.0-testing.5 for build compatibility

documentation.description: README with architecture diagram, installation, configuration, and usage

ci.description: Dependabot configuration for automated dependency updates
